TOOLTIPS.MOVE_NODE_TO_THE_LEFT: Moves the node to the left
TOOLTIPS.MOVE_NODE_TO_THE_RIGHT: Moves the node to the right
TOOLTIPS.SELECT_NODE_ON_THE_LEFT: Selects the node on the left
TOOLTIPS.SELECT_NODE_ON_THE_RIGHT: Selects the node on the right
TOOLTIPS.EDIT_NODE: Allows to edit the text of the node
TOOLTIPS.NODE_IMAGE: Adds an image to the node
TOOLTIPS.BOLD_TEXT: Changes the weight of the text
TOOLTIPS.ITALIC_TEXT: Changes the style of the text
TOOLTIPS.TEXT_SIZE: Changes the size of the text and the node
TOOLTIPS.IMAGE_SIZE: Changes the size of the node image
TOOLTIPS.ROOT_NODE_NAME_INPUT: Changes the default root node name
TOOLTIPS.CENTER_ON_RESIZING: Centers the map on window resizing
TOOLTIPS.NODE_DRAGGING: Allows to drag the nodes in the map
TOOLTIPS.AUTO_BRANCH_COLORS: Allows to choose automatically the colors of the branches

INTRODUCTION.APPLICATION_DESCRIPTION: Web application to draw mind maps.

SECTIONS.TITLE: Mind maps
SECTIONS.SUBTITLE: Mindmapp follows the Tony Buzan approach, which uses the evocative power of images and colors to make the memorization of concepts easier, stimulating creativity and mental associations.

CARDS.TITLE: Colors and images
CARDS.CONTENT: Colors and images of mind maps exploit brain characteristics to express concepts in a more effective and lasting way.

CARDS.TITLE: Radial tree
CARDS.CONTENT: Hierarchical structure of mind maps exploits the radial geometry, which is divided on several levels and facilitates concept expressiveness.

CARDS.TITLE: Uses
CARDS.CONTENT: Mind maps are particularly effective to learn or organize ideas, for example in educational or business contexts.

SECTIONS.TITLE: Goals
SECTIONS.SUBTITLE: Mindmapp is based on the simplicity and adaptability principles, and according to these principles it grows following the user's needs and future technologies, but always ensuring an intuitive application.

CARDS.TITLE: Minimal design
CARDS.CONTENT: The application offers all the essential tools to create mind maps quickly, but maintaining a simple and intuitive design.

CARDS.TITLE: Future-oriented
CARDS.CONTENT: Web technologies are constantly evolving, and with them the way they are used. Mindmapp follows and eventually adopts the latest technologies to ensure a better service.

CARDS.TITLE: Customizable
CARDS.CONTENT: A compact but adaptable and extensible system makes it easier to meet the user's individual needs. The application will grow giving particular importance to this aspect.

SECTIONS.TITLE: Donations
SECTIONS.SUBTITLE: Mindmapp is free and its code is public, every contribution is very helpful to maintain and improve the application!
